availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Walker (Hickman County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Harriett A. Bullock Walker in Hickman County, Kentucky, on October 5, 1853. Father of William F. Walker, Maria B. Walker, and Mattie Walker. Attorney in Hickman County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 501.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 208B.

Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Hickman County Administration Bonds, 1830-1869; Vol 19-20, 1970-1975, p. 48 of microfilm (Accessed via Ancestry.com on August 18, 2020).
